name: Compass SF HOME
description: Compass SF HOME promotes long-term housing stability through housing search assistance, rental subsidies, and case management. Services: - Intensive, hands-on support to help families find safe, permanent housing - Rental subsidies coupled with intensive case management - Assistance with security deposits and other move-in costs for families who have located housing - Aftercare case management for families who have exited a Compass program into permanent housing and want to continue to receive o

howToGetIt: How to get connected: - Call the 24-hour SF HOME hotline 415-547-0310 and leave a voice or text message. They will respond within two business days. - Contact (415) 644-0504 Go to 37 Grove Street- Family Coordinated Entry Access Point
